channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hacking Gamers: First-Person Shooters Targeted By New Browser Attack
item.description: A new hack attack targets first-person shooters on Steam—here’s what gamers need to know.

item.title: Save Costs, Keep Speed: Smarter Scaling For Distributed Systems
item.description: Here are a few key strategies to reduce database costs.

item.title: New Switch 2 Rumor Suggests A Serious Game Shortage At Launch
item.description: A three phase game release strategy would lock major third-party developers out of the Switch 2 launch window. But should we believe this new rumor?

item.title: Anthropic And Databricks Team Up To Help Customers Launch Their Own AI Agents
item.description: The deal will bring flagship model Claude, to thousands of corporate customers, including Comcast, Conde Nast and Block.

item.title: Solidcore Founder Shares Formula For How She Built And Sold Company For $100M
item.description: Anne Mahlum founded [solidcore], and sold it for $100 million. In this interview we explore her formula for leadership, team-building, and scaling a b...

item.title: The NSE confusions

item.title: The second time through
item.description: One way to understand creative work is to think about the time and effort required to do something the first time versus doing it again. A novel might...

item.title: Picky or particular?
item.description: A picky customer is oppositional. Whatever you offer, they want something (slightly) different. A particular customer is easy to delight. They tell yo...

item.title: Maybe it’s in how you tell it
